name: mywebsite2
description: personal website using graphql and nuxt and flutter

scripts.precommit: npm run precommit --prefix nuxt && gofmt -w graphql && flutter format flutter && npm run precommit --prefix amp && npm run precommit --prefix electron && npm run precommit --prefix init && npm run precommit --prefix docs && git add -A
scripts.init: yarn install && cd flutter && flutter pub get && flutter pub run flutter_launcher_icons:main && cd ../nuxt && yarn install && cd ../docs && yarn install && cd ../amp && yarn install && cd ../electron && yarn install && cd ../init && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.update: yarn upgrade && cd amp && yarn upgrade && cd ../docs && yarn upgrade && cd ../electron && yarn upgrade && cd ../init && yarn upgrade && cd ../nuxt && yarn upgrade && cd ..

author: Joshua Schmidt
